Similarity¶

class tstoolkit.similarity.TimeSeriesSimilarityChecker¶

Bases: object

A class for performing similarity checks on time series data.

cosine_similarity(col1: str, col2: str) → float¶

Calculate cosine similarity between two columns.

Parameters:

  • col1 (str) – Name of the first column.

  • col2 (str) – Name of the second column.

Returns:

Cosine similarity.

Return type:

float

dynamic_time_warping(col1: str, col2: str) → float¶

Calculate Dynamic Time Warping (DTW) distance between two columns.

Parameters:

  • col1 (str) – Name of the first column.

  • col2 (str) – Name of the second column.

Returns:

DTW distance.

Return type:

float

fit(data: DataFrame) → None¶

Fit Similarity Checker.

Parameters:

data (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing time series data with DateTime index.

pearson_correlation(col1: str, col2: str) → float¶

Calculate Pearson correlation coefficient between two columns.

Parameters:

  • col1 (str) – Name of the first column.

  • col2 (str) – Name of the second column.

Returns:

Pearson correlation coefficient.

Return type:

float

plot_signals(col1: str, col2: str) → None¶

Plot two columns from the time series data.

Parameters:

  • col1 (str) – Name of the first column.

  • col2 (str) – Name of the second column.
